title: EPC
description: Event-driven Process Chains can be used for modeling of business processes.
description_de: Ereignis-gesteuerte Prozessketten können für die Ablaufmodellierung von Geschäftsprozessen verwendet werden.

stencils.title: Diagram
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="800"    height="600"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <g pointer-events="fill" >     <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="0,0 0,590 9,599 799,599 799,9 790,0" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />     <rect id="diagramcanvas" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="790" height="590" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="white" />      <text font-size="22" id="diagramtext" x="400" y="25" oryx:align="top center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Title
properties.description: The title of this diagram.

properties.title: Version
properties.description: The version number of the diagram.

properties.title: Author
properties.description: Holds the name of the author of the diagram.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A detailed description of this diagram.

stencils.title: Event
stencils.description: A business event, which my occur in the course of a business process. Events also represent particular states a process is in.
stencils.description_de: Ein Geschäfts-Ereignis welches im Rahmen eines Prozesses auftreten kann. Häufig repräsentiert ein Ereignis auch gleichermaßen einen Zustand, in dem ein Prozess sich befindet.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="62"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="30" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="30" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="30" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">     <path id="celem" d="M 0 30 l 15 -30 l 70 0 l 15 30 l -15 30 l -70 0 z" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="#ffafff" />  <rect id="textrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="15" y="0" width="70" height="60" fill="none" stroke="none" />     <text font-size="11" id="text" x="50" y="30" oryx:fittoelem="textrect" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black"></text>     <text font-size="11" id="commonnesstext" x="-2" y="-5" oryx:align="right top" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Title
properties.description: The title of this event.

properties.title: Frequency
properties.description: Frequency of this Event (Occurrences per year)

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A more detailed description of the element.

stencils.title: Function
stencils.description: A business function that is performed as part of the process.
stencils.description_de: Eine Funktion ist eine Tätigkeit, die im Laufe des Prozesses anfällt und durchgeführt wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="62"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="30" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="30" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="30" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">     <rect id="celem"  oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="60" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="#96ff96" />      <text oryx:fittoelem="celem" font-size="11" id="text" x="50" y="30" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black"></text>      <text font-size="11" id="timetext" x="103" y="-10" oryx:align="left top" stroke="black"></text>         <text font-family="sans-serif" font-size="11" opacity="0.4" id="sys" x="5" y="55" oryx:align="right bottom" stroke="black">SYS</text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Title
properties.description: The title of this Function.

properties.title: Execution Time
properties.description: Duration of the function's execution (in minutes)
properties.description_de: Zeitspanne, die die Funktion zur Ausführung benötigt (in Minuten)

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A more detailed description of the element.

properties.title: Is system function?
properties.description: A system function is automated.
properties.tooltip: System functions are annotated with SYS

properties.title: URI
properties.description: The URI of the referenced process

stencils.title: AND Connector
stencils.description: The AND Connector is used for splitting and merging of the process flow in a parallel way. All branches are taken and executed in parallel.
stencils.description_de: Die UND-Regel ermöglicht es, Parallelität im Diagramm auszudrücken. Alle Zweige werden gleichzeitig durchgeführt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.1">   <g>     <ellipse id="celem" cx="16" cy="16" rx="15" ry="15" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1"/>      <path d="M 11 22 l 5 -12 l 5 12" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1" />      <text font-size="11" id="text" x="16" y="16" oryx:defaultPosition="middleRight"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: XOR Connector
stencils.description: An XOR Connector introduces an exclusive decision into a process. Either of the branches is taken. It can also be used for merging of branches.
stencils.description_de: Eine XOR-Regel wird benutzt um exklusive Entscheidungen zu modellieren ("entweder-oder"). Auch für die Zusammenführung kann die XOR-Regel benutzt werden.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.1">   <g>     <ellipse id="celem" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" cx="16" cy="16" rx="15" ry="15" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1"/>      <path oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" d="M 10 10 l 12 12 m -12 0 l 12 -12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1" />      <text font-size="11" id="text" x="16" y="16" oryx:defaultPosition="middleRight"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: OR Connector
stencils.description: The OR Connector is used to model decisions, where one or more branches are taken or merged.
stencils.description_de: Bei der ODER-Regel können einer oder mehrere Wege eingeschlagen werden. Es handelt sich somit nicht zwangsläufig um eine "entweder-oder"-Entscheidung.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="40"    height="40"    version="1.1">   <g>     <ellipse id="celem" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" cx="16" cy="16" rx="15" ry="15" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1"/>      <path oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" d="M 11 10 l 5 12 l 5 -12" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1" />      <text font-size="11" id="text" x="16" y="16" oryx:defaultPosition="middleRight"></text>   </g> </svg>

stencils.title: Control Flow
stencils.description: A control flow edge defines in which order the events and functions follow each other.
stencils.description_de: Kontrollflusskanten definieren die Reihenfolge in der Ereignisse und Funktionen aufeinander folgen.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>     <marker id="end" refX="8" refY="7" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="8" markerHeight="14" orient="auto">      <path d="M 0 0 L 8 7 L 0 14" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.5" />      </marker>    </defs>  <g id="edge">      <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" marker-end="url(#end)" />     </g> </svg>

properties.title: Probability
properties.description: The Probability of this execution path

stencils.title: Process Interface
stencils.description: A process interface can point to another process respectively to a process interface in another process. The link is navigable through the editor.
stencils.description_de: Eine Prozessschnittstelle wird genutzt um auf andere Prozesse bzw. auf eine andere Prozessschnittstelle in einem anderen Prozess zu verweisen. Die Verknüpfung ist im Editor navigierbar.

properties.title: Title
properties.description: The title of this process interface.

properties.title: URI
properties.description: The URI of the referenced process

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A more detailed description of the element.

stencils.title: Organization
stencils.description: An organizational unit can be attached to a function. It is used to visualize which department, division, etc. the function belongs to.
stencils.description_de: Eine Organisationseinheit kann an eine Funktion angeheftet werden und beschreibt somit, welcher Abteilung, welchem Geschäftsbereich, etc. sie zugeordnet wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="122"    height="52"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="50" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="120" oryx:cy="25" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="60" oryx:cy="25" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">     <ellipse id="celem" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" cx="60" cy="25" rx="60" ry="25" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="#ffffaf" />     <rect id="textrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="12" y="11" width="96" height="28" stroke="none" fill="none" />  <path d="M 10 11 l 0 28" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1" />     <text oryx:fittoelem="textrect" font-size="11" id="text" x="60" y="25" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Title
properties.description: The title of this Organization.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A more detailed description of the element.

stencils.title: Position
stencils.description: A position can be attached to a function. It is used to visualize by which role, person, etc. the function is performed.
stencils.description_de: Ein Position kann an eine Funktion angeheftet werden und beschreibt somit, durch welche Stelle, Rolle, Person, etc. sie durchgeführt wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="112"    height="42"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="55" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="110" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="55" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="55" oryx:cy="20" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="55 20" oryx:maximumSize="220 80" >     <rect id="celem" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="110" height="40" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="#ffff80" />  <rect id="textrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="7" y="0" width="101" height="40" stroke="none" fill="none" />     <path d="M 5 0 l 0 40" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1" />      <text oryx:fittoelem="textrect" font-size="11" id="text" x="55" y="20" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Title
properties.description: The title of this Position.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A more detailed description of the element.

stencils.title: Data Object
stencils.description: A data object can be attached to a function. It is a document or information used or created in the course of the function.
stencils.description_de: Ein Dokument kann an eine Funktion angeheftet werden. Dieses Dokument wird im Rahmen der Funktionsausführung verwendet oder erstellt.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="62"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="30" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="52" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="30" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="30" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">      <path id="celem" d="M 0 0 l 100 0 l 0 52 l -20 -8 l -60 16 l -20 -8 z " oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" fill="#dcdcdc" stroke-width="1" />      <text oryx:fittoelem="celem" font-size="11" id="text" x="50" y="26" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Title
properties.description: The title of this Data Object.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A more detailed description of the element.

properties.title: Is optional?
properties.description: Whether the data object is required, rather than merely permitted
properties.description_de: Ob das Dokument benötigt wird, eher als bloß die Erlaubnis gehabt

properties.title: Is consumed?
properties.description: Whether the data object can be used only once
properties.description_de: Ob das Dokument nur einmal benutzt werden kann

properties.title: Is initial?
properties.description: Whether the data object is an externally-visible process input
properties.description_de: Ob das Dokument ein extern-sichtbarer Prozessinput ist

properties.title: Is final?
properties.description: Whether the data object is an externally-visible process output
properties.description_de: Ob das Dokument eine extern-sichtbare Prozessausgabe ist

stencils.title: IT System
stencils.description: An IT System can be attached to a function. It is a system or application used by the function.
stencils.description_de: Ein IT-System kann an eine Funktion angeheftet werden. Es handelt sich um ein System oder eine Applikation die von der Funktion verwendet wird.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"    width="102"    height="62"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <oryx:magnets>    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="0" oryx:cy="30" oryx:anchors="left" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="bottom" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="100" oryx:cy="30" oryx:anchors="right" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="0" oryx:anchors="top" />    <oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="30" oryx:default="yes" />   </oryx:magnets>   <g pointer-events="fill">     <rect id="celem" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="60" stroke="black" stroke-width="1" fill="#b0b0ff" />     <rect id="textrect" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="8" y="0" width="84" height="60" stroke="none" fill="none" />  <path d="M 4 0 l 0 60" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1" />     <path d="M 8 0 l 0 60" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1" />     <path d="M 96 0 l 0 60" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1" />     <path d="M 92 0 l 0 60" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1" />     <text oryx:fittoelem="textrect" font-size="11" id="text" x="50" y="30" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Title
properties.description: The title of this IT system.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A more detailed description of the element.

stencils.title: Text Note
stencils.description: A text note for additional comments.
stencils.view: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <svg    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"    xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"    width="119"    height="65"    version="1.0">   <defs></defs>   <g pointer-events="fill">     <polyline oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" oryx:anchors="left right" id="celem" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1" points="100,60 0,60 0,0 100,0" />  <polyline oryx:anchors="right top bottom" id="celem2" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1" points="100,60 115,60 115,15 100,15" />     <polyline oryx:anchors="right top" id="celem3" stroke="black" fill="white" stroke-width="1" points="115,15 100,0 100,15 115,15" />  <text font-size="11" id="text" x="57.5" y="30" oryx:align="middle center" stroke="black"></text>   </g> </svg>

properties.title: Text
properties.description: The title of this text note.

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A more detailed description of the element.

stencils.title: Relation
stencils.description: Describes a relation between two nodes (no control flow). It is used to link e.g. an IT system to a function.
stencils.description_de: Beschreibt Beziehungen zwischen zwei Knoten (kein Kontrollfluss). Z.B. zwischen Funktion und IT-System.
stencils.view: <svg  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"  xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"  version="1.0"  oryx:edge="edge" >  <defs>      <marker id="end" refX="8" refY="7" markerUnits="userSpaceOnUse" markerWidth="8" markerHeight="14" orient="auto">      <path id="none" />      <path id="infFlow" d="M 0 0 L 8 7 L 0 14" fill="none" stroke="black" stroke-width="1.5" />     </marker>  </defs>  <g id="edge">      <path d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="black" fill="none" stroke-width="1.5" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" marker-end="url(#end)" />   <text id="text_name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="startTop"/>  </g> </svg>

properties.title: Description
properties.description: A more detailed description of the edge.

properties.title: Information Flow
properties.description: Is this relation a information flow?
